verses.verse: Now it came to pass <WH8085>, when it was reported to Sanballat <WH5571> and Tobiah <WH2900>, and to Geshem <WH1654> the Arabian <WH6163>, and unto the rest <WH3499> of our enemies <WH341>, that I had builded <WH1129> the wall <WH2346>, and that there was no breach <WH6556> left <WH3498> therein <WH1571>; (though even unto that time <WH6256> I had not set up <WH5975> the doors <WH1817> in the gates <WH8179>;)

that Sanballat <WH5571> and Geshem <WH1654> sent <WH7971> unto me <WH559>, saying, Come <WH3212>, let us meet <WH3259> together <WH3162> in one of the villages <WH3715> in the plain <WH1237> of Ono <WH207>. But they thought <WH2803> to do <WH6213> me mischief <WH7451>.

wherein was written <WH3789>, It is reported <WH8085> among the nations <WH1471>, and Gashmu <WH1654> saith <WH559> it <WH3064>, that thou and the Jews think <WH2803> to rebel <WH4775>; for which cause <WH3651> thou art building <WH1129> the wall <WH2346>: and thou wouldest be <WH1933> their king <WH4428>, according to these words <WH1697>.

Then I sent <WH7971> unto him <WH559>, saying, There are <WH1961> no such things <WH1697> done <WH1961> as thou sayest <WH559>, but thou feignest <WH908> them out of thine own heart <WH3820>.

For they all would have made us afraid <WH3372>, saying <WH559>, Their hands <WH3027> shall be weakened <WH7503> from the work <WH4399>, that it be not done <WH6213>. But now <WH2388>, O God, strengthen thou my hands <WH3027>.

And I went <WH935> unto the house <WH1004> of Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Delaiah <WH1806> the son <WH1121> of Mehetabel <WH4105>, who was shut up <WH6113>; and he said <WH559>, Let us meet together <WH3259> in the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, within <WH8432> the temple <WH1964>, and let us shut <WH5462> the doors <WH1817> of the temple <WH1964>: for they will come <WH935> to slay <WH2026> thee <WH3915>; yea, in the night will they come <WH935> to slay thee <WH2026>.

And I said <WH559>, Should such <WH3644> a man <WH376> as I flee <WH1272>? and who is there <WH935>, that, being such as I, would go into the temple <WH1964> to save his life <WH2425>? I will not go in <WH935>.

And I discerned <WH5234>, and <WH430>, lo, God had not sent <WH7971> him <WH1696>; but he pronounced this prophecy <WH5016> against me <WH2900>: and Tobiah and Sanballat <WH5571> had hired him <WH7936>.
